name: Brazil Phone Number Pattern
description:
Validates the Brazilian Phone number Pattern.

Some recognized patterns:

(99) 9999-9999
(99)-9999-9999
(99) 9999.9999
(99)-9999.9999
(99) 99999-9999
(99)-99999-9999
(99) 99999.9999
(99)-99999.9999

All of this without the parenthesis.
author: Thiago Abreu
